==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=英雄难过美人关|type=21121}}

===Etymology===
Literally: A brave hero will find it difficult to get past an outpost that is occupied by a beautiful woman.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=yīngxióng nán guò měirén guān
|cat=prov
}}

===Proverb===
{{zh-proverb}}

# Even the strongest warrior can be seduced by a beautiful woman.
